title: Convert from multi-region to single PostgreSQL database
description: Simplify the application to work with a single PostgreSQL database instead of multiple regions. Remove region-based logic and UI elements.

title: Remove LaunchDarkly imports from other files
close_reason: Removed LaunchDarkly imports from main.py, pages.py, and config.py

title: Remove feature flags system entirely
description: Since all features are enabled by default and we removed LaunchDarkly, we should remove the entire feature flag system and inline the defaults
close_reason: Removed entire feature flags system - all features now enabled by default

title: Clean up LaunchDarkly configuration and env vars
close_reason: Removed LaunchDarkly from pyproject.toml, justfile, and cleaned up configuration

title: Remove LaunchDarkly code from feature_flags.py
close_reason: Replaced LaunchDarkly with simple feature flag implementation

title: Add Docker Compose setup for local development
description: Create docker-compose.yml with PostgreSQL and app containers, supporting both local and remote database connections
close_reason: Added Docker Compose setup with conditional PostgreSQL service based on DATABASE_URL environment variable
